title: Mac: Add "Services" context menu when composing new mail
content:
macOS allows applications to register their entries to the "Services" menu, that appears with right-click on items in the Finder but also in applications where you can write text. I need that menu in the text field where you compose a new email. Is that possible to activate?

My workaround is now to write the text somewhere else where the menu is available, apply it and then copy-paste the result.

title: otwieranie pdf w tworzonej wiadomości
content:
Cześć

Nie mogę otwierać plików pdf w tworzonej wiadomości:


Plik C:\Users\marec\OneDrive\Pulpit\FV MC naprawa auta.pdf nie może zostać otwarty, ponieważ powiązana z nim aplikacja pomocnicza nie istnieje. Zmień powiązania dla tego typu pliku w preferencjach.

Natomiast pliki pdf załączone w poczcie, która otrzymuję mogę otworzyć np. z Foxit lub Ashampoo.

Jak w ustawieniach można rozwiązać ten problem?

Win10-64 TBird 141.0 64-bit everything fully upated

I don't know what I did to cause this, but I'd like to go back!

title: Sometimes my Earthlink password doesn't work in Thunderbird
content: At least once a day I'll get a popup message that says my Earthlink password has failed and gives the option to Retry or Cancel. If I press Retry, the password works and I can download my email but the email alert sound keeps playing over and over until I have to shut down Thunderbird and relaunch it to stop it from doing that. I've had to disable incoming mail alerts. I've checked my email settings with Earthlink and they're all correct. I'm currently using version 128.12.0esr (64-bit) on Ubuntu but this has happened on multiple versions over the last few years.
creator: euphgeek

title: Thunderbird Saved Search keeps deleting
content:
I'm using Thunderbird on a MacBook Pro with multiple M365 and Google Workspace accounts. I have created two Saved Searches, which are in Favorites Folders and perform as intended (one searching multiple email addresses across multiple Inboxes). A third search has been created several times and keeps disappearing. It searches for all Inbox email across 3 accounts and searches for 6 different emails (To: or cc:). This third search is actually where I spend most of my day, so it's important to me. Any thoughts???

Thanks in advance.

title: E-mail error message "The folder Inbox on (my zoominternet e-mail address) could not be compacted because writing to folder failed."
content: Today every time I open my e-mail account I get the following error message: "The folder Inbox on (my zoominternet e-mail address) could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disk space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again." Never seen this error message before today. What should I do to get rid of it or correct the problem? I am receiving e-mails, but I haven't tried to send any. Thank you.
creator: robertaj537

title: outgoing error message
content:
My previously stable Thunderbird install stopped sending outgoing messages a few days ago. I get a "Sending of message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.charter.net timed out. Try again." error message. Charter says not their problem because I can send from their email web site. I've disabled anti-virus, tweaked SMPT settings to match the recommended settings, and tried just about every combination of security and authentication setting there is and got nowhere. If I turn authentication off, I stop getting the time out error and get an user name rejected error. I am out of ideas.

Dale
creator: Dbrodin

title: Thunderbird deletes additional emails by mistake
content: When deleting an email in my Inbox, Thunderbird sometimes deletes adjacent other emails (the one above or below). Please fix this!!
creator: teridietz

title: Moving messages within Thunderbird
content: I use Thunderbird 140.0esr (64 bit) under Windows 11. In recent days I can usually not move or copy an email message between folders, though occasionally a move succeeds for no obvious reason. For instance, I right-click an email in my Inbox and ask to move it to folder abc. It disappears from Inbox but does not show up in abc. If I look for it in All Mail it's there, but I cannot move or copy it to abc from there either. Usually I get no error message, but today I got one saying I should check my write privileges and disc space. I searched on a browser for write privileges and found information about Windows but nothing about Thunderbird. I have adequate disc space. This problem only appeared on about 29 July 2025; before then, moving and copying worked reliably both by right-clicking and by drag-and-drop.
